remarks: Version of ~ equsalh with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  Remark: this is the same as ~ equsalhw .  (Contributed by BJ, 14-Jun-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-equsalhv.nf $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
bj-equsalhv.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bj-equsalhv $p |- ( A. x ( x = y -> ph ) <-> ps ) $.
$d x y $.
